main event: Two sightings of unidentified flying objects occurred in October 1956, one near Ft. Thomas, Kentucky.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a large disk-shaped object observed for 3 minutes that was metallic grey and stationary,The second sighting described a bright round object hovering 50 feet above a bridge, observed for about 10 minutes before it accelerated and disappeared,The observer of the second sighting was a reliable ex-U.S. Air Force member and private pilot,The object in the second sighting was described as brilliantly luminous and soundless,Both reports concluded insufficient data for thorough evaluation.
sighted object: unknown flying objects, one described as a large disk and one as a bright round object
witness description: one observer was an ex-member of the U.S. Air Force and a licensed private pilot, the other was a local worker from General Electric Co.
